com.hazelcast.internal.nearcache

Interface NearCache<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of the key
    V - the type of the value
    All Superinterfaces:
    InitializingObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultNearCache

    public interface NearCache<K,V>
extends InitializingObject
    NearCache is the contract point to store keys and values in underlying NearCacheRecordStore.

      • put

        void put(K key,
         Data keyData,
         V value)
        Puts (associates) a value with the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the value will be stored
        keyData - the key as Data of the value will be stored
        value - the value will be stored

      • invalidate

        void invalidate(K key)
        Removes the value associated with the given key and increases the invalidation statistics.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the value will be invalidated

      • isSerializeKeys

        boolean isSerializeKeys()
        Checks if the Near Cache key is stored in serialized format or by-reference.
        Returns:
        true if the key is stored in serialized format, false if stored by-reference.

      • selectToSave

        Object selectToSave(Object... candidates)
        Selects the best candidate object to store from the given candidates.
        Parameters:
        candidates - the candidates from which the best candidate object will be selected.
        Returns:
        the best candidate object to store, selected from the given candidates.

        boolean isPreloadDone()
        Checks if the pre-loading of the Near Cache is done.

      • unwrap

        <T> T unwrap(Class<T> clazz)
        Used to access non-standard methods of an implementation.

        If this method is called on a wrapper object, result is wrapped object.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the class modeled by this Class object
        Parameters:
        clazz - the type of returning object.
        Returns:
        an instance of the supplied clazz type.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no implementation found for the supplied clazz type.

      • tryReserveForUpdate

        long tryReserveForUpdate(K key,
                         Data keyData)
        Tries to reserve supplied key for update.

        If one thread takes reservation, only that thread can update the key.

        Parameters:
        key - key to be reserved for update
        keyData - key to be reserved for update as Data
        Returns:
        reservation ID if reservation succeeds, else returns NearCacheRecord.NOT_RESERVED

      • tryPublishReserved

        V tryPublishReserved(K key,
                     V value,
                     long reservationId,
                     boolean deserialize)
        Tries to update reserved key with supplied value. If update happens, value is published. Publishing means making the value readable to all threads. If update fails, record is not updated.
        Parameters:
        key - reserved key for update
        value - value to be associated with reserved key
        reservationId - ID for this reservation
        deserialize - eagerly deserialize returning value
        Returns:
        associated value if deserialize is true and update succeeds, otherwise returns null
